post.title: Tips to reduce your national phase filing cost
post.content:
1. Do not use multiple dependent claims - no claim should refer to claims that refer to more than one other claim.
  2. Limit your patent specification to less than 10 pages.
  3. Limit your claims to 10 claims.
  4. Select countries that do not require translation.
  5. Use regional systems (ARIPO and OAPI) for African countries (apart from South Africa and Nigeria).
  6. Instruct national phase filing more than 3 weeks prior to the deadline to reduce late filing fees for supporting documents.
  7. Make necessary amendments during the PCT phase.
  8. Record assignments during the PCT phase.
